title: What are some iconic game intros that can give away the game title without naming the game? - Quora

response.answer_text: Alternate Reality for Atari 800. It was attempting to be a larger game that was possible. That cinematic opening was such an impressive opening scene. And that fit on a floppy. A TRUE floppy. One that flops when you wiggle it. Not even a 90s PC “floppy” that doesn't flop.
